name: s3up-meta
description: A simple function to upload files to Amazon S3. Refactored from s3up by Lepozepo and added metadata for caching of uploaded files.

scripts.make-docs: npm run prepublish && jsdoc lib -r -d docs && rm -rf lib
scripts.postpublish: rm -rf jsFromCoffee && rm -rf client && rm -rf server
scripts.reinstall-examples: npm pack && cd examples/meteor && rm -rf node_modules/s3up && meteor npm i && cd ../../ && npm run postpublish

readme: A simple function to upload files to Amazon S3. Refactored from s3up by Lepozepo and added metadata for caching of uploaded files.
author: paulincai
